Class com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaEvent 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaObject
           |
           +----com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaEvent
public abstract class KawaEvent
extends KawaObject
KawaEvent is the base class for all event classes in Kawa.

KawaEvent(int, KawaObject)

consume()
Call to prevent further processing of this event by other event listeners or by Kawa.
getID()
Returns the event ID of the event
getSource()
Returns a reference to the source of this event
isConsumed()

KawaEvent 
 public KawaEvent(int eventID,
                  KawaObject source)

getID 
 public int getID()
Returns the event ID of the event

Returns:
ID of the event
getSource 
 public KawaObject getSource()
Returns a reference to the source of this event

consume 
 public void consume()
Call to prevent further processing of this event by other event listeners or by Kawa. For example on FILE_SAVING event, in order to stop Kawa from processing this event call this method to indicate that the file should not be saved.

isConsumed 
 protected boolean isConsumed()
